DataElement.preferredName: Topical Corticosteroid Therapy Stable Dose Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Code Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A coded response to questions which are necessary to allow a person to participate in a clinical study that are related to stable dose of topical agents as outlined in the protocol.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Topical Corticosteroid Therapy Stable Dose Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Treatment with a corticosteroid formulation designed for and administered onto a dermal, ocular or mucosal surface._Subject to little fluctuation; showing little if any change._A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Treatment with a corticosteroid formulation designed for and administered onto a dermal, ocular or mucosal surface.

Concepts.definition: Treatment with a corticosteroid formulation designed for and administered onto a dermal, ocular or mucosal surface.

Concepts.definition: Subject to little fluctuation; showing little if any change.

Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.:The non-affirmative response to a question.:Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context.:A system of numbered categories for representation of data.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created to support Theradex design of CRFs for NCI CCR trials

ReferenceDocuments.name: If patient is on low or moder
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient is on low or moderate potency topical corticosteroids, are they on a stable dose for at least 4 weeks prior to enrollment?
